description:
Ryuuji`s classmate. She has feelings for Ryuuji, but is shy whenever she is around Ryuuji, making it hard for her to approach him casually and express her feelings. She is in shock after misunderstanding Ryuuji and Rose being engaged. She seems a bit strange after taking a photo of Ryuuji`s x-ray during the interview on her cellphone, she may be the stalker type.
Source: wiki
name: Etou Misaki
